title: Exit Sherlock Holmes: The Great Detective's Final Days
description: In October 1903, the incredible news reached Baker Street. Moriarty--the great detective's arch-foe--had not died amid the swirling torrents of the Reichenbach Falls. He lived to plague humanity once more!In a trice, Holmes had mysteriously disappeared, leaving the good doctor alone at the mercy of the Napoleon of Crime. And causing Watson to begin some perilous and far-reaching researches into corners of Holmes's life that have so far remained unrevealed.
author: Robert Lee Hall
